mdRecord.dcterms:title: Office of Egerton & Bro. Baltimore, Md., January 2nd, 1854: Dear Sir, We take the liberty of sending to your address our circular of the Maryland lotteries for the month of January, 1854
Magnificent Maryland lotteries for January, 1854. Payment of prizes guaranteed by the state of Maryland
Maryland lotteries for January, 1854
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signed: Egerton & Bro. Box 103 Post Office, Baltimore, Md. John B. Egerton, Chas. C. Egerton, Jr. [original]

"We could, had we sufficient room, enumerate hundreds of cases and illustrate them by many amusing anecdotes of persons who have been suddenly raised to afluence and placed beyond the reach of want by a timely application at our office. ... " -- p. [4] [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Papers of the Ambler Family, MSS 1921-A. [original]
